p.codeblock: public static synchronized Rte getFromBridge() throws RteException

section.p: The RTE object created through this method does not require calling for initialization. If the RTC engine has not yet been created and initialized, you can first call to create an RTE object and then call to initialize it.

The RTE object created through this method does not require initialization via . If you have not yet created and initialized the RTC engine, you can first create an RTE object using RTE, and then call for initialization.

section.title: Timing
section.p: Before calling this method, make sure you have called to initialize the RTC engine.
Before calling this method, make sure you have called to initialize the RTC engine.

plentry.pd: An output parameter. Used to receive status or error information. See .

section.title: Exceptions
section.p: If the method call fails, the SDK throws an and returns the corresponding error information. You need to catch and handle this exception.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: The RTE object, if the method call succeeds. See RTE.
An empty pointer , if the method call fails.

section.p: If the method call is successful, returns an RTE object.
